body_html:
The folder i use is from Model folder for inception v1.

https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim

but not contrib folder below

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/slim/python/slim

I think they should be the same, is that right?

So i should change is_training=True to False of the line below for training. correct me if wrong.

https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/slim/train_image_classifier.py#L424

body:
The folder i use is from **Model** folder for inception v1.

https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim 

but not **contrib** folder below

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/slim/python/slim

I think they should be the same, is that right?

So i should change **is_training=True** to **False** of the line below for training. correct me if wrong.

https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/slim/train_image_classifier.py#L424
